text: Abnormality of skin pigmentation - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Cutaneous mastocytosis - Feeding difficulties - High palate - Intellectual disability - Microtia - Underdeveloped nasal alae - Wide nasal bridge - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percentag
